chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: My address is Regenpfeiferweg 24, 70378 Stuttgart. Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile

the parcel was returned to the sender and arrived at your warehouse today.

The customer wants a refund.

Please act accordingly.

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are checking with our logistics partner regarding the reception of the parcel. We would process the refund once we receive confirmation from them.

Thank you.
Regards,
SY

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 420.16€ to the customer for not respecting the deadline to make the refund

Kind regards, 
Claudia from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Could we confirm if the customer is refunded?

Regards,
SY
